# Changelog Tink modal Angular directive

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
This project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/).

<!--
## [Unreleased] - [unreleased]

### Added
### Changed
### Deprecated
### Removed
### Fixed
### Security
-->



## [1.1.3] - 2016-02-18

### Fixed
- Fixed incorrect documentation



## [1.1.2] - 2016-02-18

### Added
- isOpen property on $modal



## [1.1.1] - 2016-02-01

### Fixed
- Fixed incorrect documentation



## [1.1.0] - 2016-02-01

### Added
- Added option to disable the use of the ESC key to close modal
- Added option to enable click on backdrop to close modal



## [1.0.4] - 2015-12-03

### Added
- Added backdrop



## [1.0.3] - 2015-07-29

### Changed
- Changed angular version to 1.4.3



## [1.0.2] - 2015-06-10

### Changed
- Updated documentation
- Separated code license
- Updated reference to the external style sheet



## [1.0.1] - 2015-06-09

### Changed
- Updated documentation



## [1.0.0] - 2015-04-23

Initial release
